author: Sigmund Freud
quote: The interpretation of dreams is the royal road to a knowledge of the unconscious activities of the mind.

author: Sigmund Freud
quote: Dreams are never concerned with trivialities.

author: Sigmund Freud
quote: The dream is never concerned with trifles; we do not allow sleep to be disturbed by trivialities.

author: Carl Gustav Jung
quote: The dream is a little hidden door in the innermost and most secret recesses of the soul, opening into that cosmic night which was psyche long before there was any ego-consciousness.

author: Carl Gustav Jung
quote: The dream arises from a part of the mind unknown to us, but none the less important, and is concerned with the desires for the approaching day.
